Description: Fragment from the corner of a pottery soul-house. Part of same object as EA46621-532 according to Zitman (2010, 217(II)).
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr David George Hogarth
Bibliographic references: Zitman 2010 / The necropolis of Assiut: a case study of local Egyptian funerary culture from the Old Kingdom to the end of the Middle Kingdom (II, 217)
